channel.title: [508] Can't run my client
channel.description:
Yeah, im working on 508 client and when i try to launch it to play it always gives me this error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
idk how to fix it im kinda new to these things, also whats in my cmd is
@echo off java -Xmx512m client 66 live live software members english game0 pause
idk what to do please help me!

item.title: [508] Can't run my client
item.dc:creator: @epiccrayon epiccrayon
item.description:
@epiccrayon wrote:

im just guessing but i think you need to download jdk 1.7.0_05

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Can't run my client
item.dc:creator: @3mj96 3mj96
item.description:
@3mj96 wrote:

Yeah, im working on 508 client and when i try to launch it to play it always gives me this error

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

idk how to fix it im kinda new to these things, also whats in my cmd is

@echo off
java -Xmx512m client 66 live live software members english game0
pause

idk what to do please help me!
